APP_Description.message: AniList quick search in your browser.

AUTH_Success.message: You are now logged in as $USERNAME$

E_AniListInvalidUser.message: AniList request failed: Response does not contains user data. Response: $DATA$
E_AniListInvalidUser.description: Error when data from AniList are invalid User.

E_AnilistRequest.description: Error when a request on AniList fails.

E_AnilistSearchResults.description: Error when data from AniList are invalid search results.

E_AuthMissingAccessToken.message: Missing access token after AniList authentication
E_AuthMissingAccessToken.description: Error when access token is missing from redirect url after auth.

E_StorageMissingAccessToken.message: Missing access token in local storage
E_StorageMissingAccessToken.description: Error when access token is missing from storage.

E_UserRefreshFailed.message: We couldn't get your account information, your token might be invalid. Please login again.

N_ActivityFeedClearFailed.message: Failed to clear your activity feed: $DATA$
N_ActivityFeedClearFailed.description: Notification sent when activity feed clear failed.

N_ActivityFeedClearSuccess.message: Your activity feed have been cleared
N_ActivityFeedClearSuccess.description: Notification sent when activity feed is cleared.

N_LogoutSuccess.message: Don't forget to remove the access token in your AniList > Apps setting page.
N_LogoutSuccess.description: Notification sent when user logged out.

N_UserRefreshSuccess.message: Your data have successfully been refreshed.
N_UserRefreshSuccess.description: Notification sent when user data are refreshed.

S_ActivityDescription.message: Ani-Search can save your search history and visited pages (anime, manga, studio, character and staff). This is here to help you quickly go back to a previous search or a previously visited page.

S_ActivityEmpty.message: Nothing in your activity feed. Search something!

S_DataDescription.message: We do not collect any of your data in any way, we don't care what you're whatching or reading. Just enjoy this extension :)

S_EnableContextualMenusDescription.message: Ani-Search adds contextual actions to quickly search the selected text on a page.

S_InformationActivityDescription.message:
Search history and visited pages are stored locally, on your browser.

This means that if you have Ani-Search installed in multiple browsers on the same computer, or in multiple browsers on different computers, each Ani-Search extension will have its own activity feed.

S_LegalDescription.message: Ani-Search is an open source project not affiliated with AniList.

S_LoginDescription.message: Login out here will not remove the access token generated by AniList. Please go to your Settings > Apps page and revoke the Ani-Search app for a complete logout.

S_NoMediaForStudio.message: No media to preview for this studio.

S_NotLoggedIn.message: You are currently not logged in

S_NotLoggedInDescription.message: Log in to enable search on your personal Anime and Manga lists.

S_ResultsOnListFirstDescription.message: Wether to display search results from your personal lists or global search results first.
